text: musa tumba kopagondu duhkhadondige tam'ma janangada balige maralidaru. Avaru helidaru; nanna janangadavare, nim'ma odeyanu nimage bahala srestha vagdanavannu nidiralillave? Vagdanada kalavadhiyu nimage tumba dirghavenisibittite? Athava nivu nim'ma odeyana kopavannu amantrisalu bayasi adakkagi nanna jotegina kararannu muridira
